generated_description: bernd greindl is a company based in dingolfing, bavaria, specializing in the fields of steel construction and metalworking. the company provides consultation, planning, production, and installation services in steel and metal construction, metalworking, and art smithing. with extensive experience and traditional craftsmanship, bernd greindl offers cost-effective, timely, and professional solutions for various projects, including balconies, railings, stairs, fences, special constructions, gates, fire pits, and garden installations. the company emphasizes detailed consultation, technical implementation, and adherence to economic principles.
